casebody.data:
James Arthur JOHNSON
v.
Wayne GAY, Sheriff of Wilson County, North Carolina. No. 641P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 5, 2005. Johnny S. Gaskins, Raleigh, for James Arthur Johnson. Bill Wolfe, Assistant District Attorney, for Wayne Gay.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 28th day of December 2004 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wilson County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of January 2005."
